snippet.title: Inside Llewyn Davis
snippet.description: With Inside Llewyn Davis, [The Cohen's] have made a film that is almost spooky in its perversity: a lovingly lived-in, detailed tribute to the folk scene that -- hauntingly -- has shut their hero out.
